trans-unit.source: The key that belongs to the value to create.
trans-unit.target: 屬於所要建立之值的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that creates a non-default value to add as part of a key/value pair to a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable`2" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 代表方法，這個方法會建立非預設值，以作為索引鍵/值組的一部分加入 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable`2" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a reference type that represents the value to attach to the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 參考類型的執行個體，代表要附加至所指定索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback> delegate encapsulates a callback method that is invoked by the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method when the key passed to the method is not found in the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback>委派所封裝所叫用回呼方法<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>中找不到方法金鑰傳遞至方法時<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A> method passes the callback method the key that represents a managed object to which a property value is to be dynamically attached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A>方法就會傳遞的回呼方法，表示是以動態方式附加屬性值的受管理的物件的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for returning the property value to its caller, which, in turn, adds the key/value pair to the table.
trans-unit.target: 方法負責傳回至呼叫端，其接著會新增至資料表的索引鍵/值組的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback> method is used to return an instance of a reference type that can be attached to the specified key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback>方法用來傳回可附加至指定之索引鍵的參考類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It enables that instance to be initialized using non-default values.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓使用非預設值初始化該執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the key is not found in the table, the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetOrCreateValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method adds a key/value pair in which the value is initialized using default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果在資料表中，找不到索引鍵<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetOrCreateValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法將索引鍵/值組中的值，初始化使用預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別。
`MainInfo` 相關資訊提供`MainClass`執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It also defines a static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `CreateAttachedValue` method that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback> delegate and passed to the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它也會定義靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`CreateAttachedValue`方法可以指派給<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.CreateValueCallback>委派，並傳遞給<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example calls the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A> method to add a `MainClass` object and its corresponding `MainInfo` object to a <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602> table.
trans-unit.target: 範例會呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetValue%2A>方法，將`MainClass`物件和其相對應`MainInfo`物件<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602>資料表。

trans-unit.source: The example also illustrates calls to the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetOrCreateValue%2A> methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and a call to the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.TryGetValue%2A> method to retrieve the value that belongs to an existing key.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也說明如何呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.Add%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.GetOrCreateValue%2A>方法，以將索引鍵/值組加入至資料表，而呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable%602.TryGetValue%2A>方法來擷取屬於現有的索引鍵的值。
